name: Tolga Çevik
summary: Tolga Çevik. Actor: Magic Carpet Ride. Tolga Çevik was born on 12 May 1974 in Istanbul, Turkey. He is an actor and writer, known for Magic Carpet Ride (2005), Arkadasim Hosgeldin (2013) and Sen Kimsin? (2012). He has been married to Özge Yilmaz since 9 September 2004. They have two children.
